text: [Faristagon] Ba onho megujand: «Dar ʙajni guruhhoe az cin va ins, ki pes az sumo [kofiru gumroh] ʙudand, dar otas [-i duzax] vorid saved». Har goh guruhe vorid mesavand, guruhi digarro la'nat mekunand, to hangome ki [sarancom] hamagi dar onco ʙa ham merasand. Pajravoni [fireʙxurdai] onho dar ʙorai rahʙaronason megujand: «Parvardigoro, inho ʙudand, ki moro gumroh kardand. Pas, azoʙi ducand az otas ʙa onon ʙideh». [Alloh taolo] Mefarmojad: «Baroi har kadom [az sumo azoʙi] ducand ast, vale namedoned»
